channel.title: Yell command
channel.description: How can i make yell command you need 2 attack to yell?

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:15, topic:259990”]give them a warning. or a mute by report abuse. if its delta then the mute command.

[quote author=Digital Hotdogs link=topic=343292.msg2652031#msg2652031 date=1233590004]

Ahh alright. Anyway best of luck stopping those SYI’s from advertising in yell! ;D
I would rather use 1 connection per IP though as people would stop complaining about they can’t use yell while there in fights because they don’t bring cash to PvP.

i got one connectin g from ip… but still ppl login with skypkpker … and spam with yell with one acc
[/quote]IP Ban them.
Just because someone spams with yell doesn’t mean you should disable it for the newbies, what if a new person logged on and you were at admin zone, he wouldn’t know how to contact you. You can have it on login message to use ::yell Hi how do I start?

most servers have the owners name when u first login, so they can add the owner and contact him/her.

some servers dont have it at all.[/quote]And I care about that how? What if the new player has no ways of contacting him/her?
No MSN/AIM/Yahoo?

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

Well I’m no pro but I am thinking of something like this:

} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if(playerHasItem(995) == true) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); } else { sendMessage("You need a coin to use the yell command.."); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

I GOT OK, BUT THEN I WANT THEY NEED A ITEM OR SOMETHING TO YELL LIKE THIS:

if (playerHasItem(995, 10000){ if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 4) String text = command.substring(4); yell(""+playerName+" yells: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else { sM("You need 10k to yell"); }
that will working you think ?

Read full topic
